blog.name: mha-noir
blog.title: Writings beneath a pale moon
blog.description: Hi, I'm Moon, and welcome to my MHA writing blog! Here you can find my writing, my vigilante ocs and ask me about them or about quirks (theories, concept help, analysis, etc.)

summary: I would like another quirk anaylasis please! My other ocs name is Masa and she has a quirk that allows her to manipulate water....
question: I would like another quirk anaylasis please! My other ocs name is Masa and she has a quirk that allows her to manipulate water. This includes other liquids that contains water too. She can gather it, disperse it, make it take different shapes, make it float and move around. The nerf is that she can only manipulate as much water as she can physically carry. Moving more than she can carry causes severe muscle pain and depending on how severe it is, she might not even be able to move for awhile.
answer:
Hi there! Thank you for sending in another request!

So with this quirk, I was thinking about the properties of water from the get go. To be precise, I thought of how water is a fantastic conductor of electricity (is it just me or do a lot of my analyses’ have to do with electricity? oooooof). I looked up their chemical properties, and found that water molecules are polar, possessing a negative charge due to how the hydrogens and the oxygen share their electrons.

Therefore, I believe that Masa generates a positive electromagnetic field that conducts the negative water molecules in various liquids as needed. The electromagnetic field is generated through the combination of bioelectricity and phosphates in muscles, hence the fact that Masa can only manipulate as much as she can normally carry. Generating the electric field essentially strains the muscles as using them normally to carry things would.

blog.name: fantasydaydreamers
blog.title: Bakugou Sexual
blog.description: Currently, I only write Bakugou FICS but that might change soon • Imagines and headcannons.. what can go wrong? • Fangirling and thirst is ahead🤪 •

body:
The Fantasy Masterlist✨

✨ Characters are mentioned at the end of each summary

✨ Warnings are only listed if the post contains any ‘specific’ content. They are also mentioned in the actual fic post as well.

→ Fanfics

  • The Real Thing - “In the future where Bakugou is now a pro-hero, a sex shop decides to release replicas of the top heroes dicks. Will you get the Ground Zero limited edition dildo or something better?” + (Bakugou x Reader) + (Warnings: slight lemon)
  • The Real Thing Pt. 2 - Continuation of part 1 + (Warnings: Lemon)
  • The Burning Rose - “You receive tickets to your favorite band, 'The Heartless Heroes.’ You have a crush on the lead singer, Bakugou Katsuki. Will he notice you at the show? Turns out, he’s not as heartless as the band name suggests.” + (Bakugou x Reader)
  • The Prince Diaries - “You are the daughter of a small kingdom invited to Prince Shouto’s coronation where he will choose a future bride! Not wanting to be there, you try to eliminate yourself first, however, will things go as planned?” + (Todoroki x Reader)
  • Succubus in Training - “Class 1A has a Sex-Ed class that teaches them about a new species of humans that have sexual quirks and can be summoned. The Bakusquad decides it would be funny to test it out on an unsuspecting Bakugou. However, after you show up and rock his world, Bakugou is the one who will have the last laugh.” + (Bakugou x Reader) + (Warnings: Lemon)
  • Bad Boy Next Door - “You move to the outskirts of the city and means of escaping the busy life. In your new home, love forms over a balcony in the mysterious boy next door can’t seem to stay away. This "peaceful” move got you more than what you bargained for.“ + (Bakugou x Reader)

→ Headcanons

  • The Original Dildo Series - Hero and villain dildo headcanons and shown at the end of this post is a list of other characters + (Multi Characters x Reader) + (Warnings: Lemon)
  • Bakugou Finding You Own Another Sex Toy - Reaction Headcanons + (Warnings: Lemon)

✨ Bakugou Finding Out You Own Tokoyami’s and Tamaki’s Dildo + (Warnings: Lemon)

  • BJs on The Clock - "He’s been sending you flirty texts all day…so when you show up to the Hero Agency unannounced, will you be able to relieve him of his desires or will you get caught in the process?” + (Multi Characters x Reader) + (Warnings: Lemon)

blog.name: mha-noir
blog.title: Writings beneath a pale moon
blog.description: Hi, I'm Moon, and welcome to my MHA writing blog! Here you can find my writing, my vigilante ocs and ask me about them or about quirks (theories, concept help, analysis, etc.)

tags: i hope i did alright with this
summary: Hey could I get some angst with Edgeshot maybe he's working on a risky scene and gets hurt while on the job. His S/o is...
question: Hey could I get some angst with Edgeshot maybe he's working on a risky scene and gets hurt while on the job. His S/o is determined to make him rest no matter how much he might protest against it. Could also be fluffy as well. Thanks a bunch.
answer:
Edgeshot was getting sick and tired of all these gangs causing this trouble. This was the third one this week, and they had gotten their fair number of hits in. He had been dragged into open combat with them, and had earned himself a number of new bruises across his body.

‘God, s/o is not going to be pleased about this,’ he thought to himself as he secured the gang members he had just defeated. Whenever he got injured when not on a major case, they would give him a look that he learned to dread. If there is one thing that Edgeshot hates, it’s disappointing his s/o.

One of the gang members muttered something under his breath, leading Edgeshot to give a sigh. He was tired and simply wanted to go home so that he could relax with s/o. 

“Care to repeat that?” he asked the criminal, putting on a fake jolly tone.

“I said, you should have gone for the kill you stupid knock off Naruto,” the criminal spat out, malice lacing their voice.

The next thing Edgeshot knew, there was a loud boom, a sudden heat, and everything went dark.

……………

Edgeshot came too to the sound of beeping machinery. He opened his eyes and found himself in a hospital bed, wires all hooked up to him. Next to him was his s/o, looking quite tired. Amidst all this, the very first thought he had was, ‘did that piece of trash actually call me “knock off Naruto”?’

Just after he thought that, his s/o noticed that he had woken up and sprang up.

“Hey! How are you feeling?”

“My body is pretty sore from whatever grenade or explosive that guy used, but I’m okay besides that.”

His s/o sighed in relief at that before their face morphed into a frown, eyebrows brought together in anger. “What was it you said this morning? ‘Today will be a tame day,’ right?”

“In my defence, it wasn’t my fault this time.”

“Regardless of whether it was your fault, you will be taking the full medical leave, you will be following the daily regimen set by the doctor while at home, and you will not be excessively exerting yourself at any point.”

This made edgeshot raise his eyebrows. “Is all that really necessary? I can at least be doing paperwork until I’m cleared for field work.”

“I don’t care. You’re sticking to those terms and that’s final.”

“Dear, real-”

“You could have died!” his s/o cried out, “Do you realize that?! You could have died and I’d be able to do nothing but watch as they lower you into a grave! I have nightmares about you dying! Do you even think about that!?”

His s/o was properly sobbing at that point. “I watch you leave every morning wondering if you’re going to come home or not!”

Edgeshot didn’t know what to say. He had no idea that his career was affecting his s/o like that, that he had been hurting them so badly.

“I have to head back home so I can prepare things for when they release you, I’ll pick you up then.”

Just before they walked through the door, they turned back to Edgeshot and said, “just…please listen to what I’m saying.”

And with that, they left, leaving the shinobi hero to think about his shortcomings in how he’d been handling his relationship.

His s/o was properly sobbing at that point. “I watch you leave every morning wondering if you’re going to come home or not!”

Edgeshot didn’t know what to say. He had no idea that his career was affecting his s/o like that, that he had been hurting them so badly.

“I have to head back home so I can prepare things for when they release you, I’ll pick you up then.”

Just before they walked through the door, they turned back to Edgeshot and said, “just…please listen to what I’m saying.”

And with that, they left, leaving the shinobi hero to think about his shortcomings in how he’d been handling his relationship.

title: Tag, you're it
description:
by RinaTheDerp

was a tumblr prompt I wanted to write for years. So here y'all go with Baku Squad vs. Deku Squad.

blog.name: todokamiweek
blog.title: Todokami Week 2k19
blog.description: A week dedicated to the rare pair ship Todoroki x Kaminari! Running from the 1st-8th July. Header credits to @suntails https://discord.gg/uKv47SN

summary: Just a reminder that there’s only a few days left until todokami week!! It’s running from July 1-8, and we are so excited to...
caption:
Just a reminder that there’s only a few days left until todokami week!! It’s running from July 1-8, and we are so excited to celebrate these two!

We will be tracking the tag #todokamiweek2k19, so make sure to upload your content with this tag so we can find you!

A reminder of the prompts and rules under the cut! :O

Day 1: Confessions / Childhood friends / Quirkless / Mermaid

Day 2: Soulmates / Domestic / Angel-Demon / Hanahaki

Day 3: Do you trust me? / Tutoring buddies / Miraculous Ladybug / Body-quirk swap

Day 4: Sunrise-sunset / Fashion is our passion / Pokemon / Villain

Day 5: It hurts not to remember (amnesia) / Flowers / Disney-Marvel / Working at the same mall

Day 6: May I have this dance? / Double dates / Cafe-Florist-Bakery / Pro-hero

Day 7: Butterfly kisses / Snowy snuggles / Fantasy / Celebrity-Idol

Final day: Free (choose your own) / Memories / Mythology / Vigilantes

The same rules from last year’s Todokami Week also apply for this year, so please read the following carefully:

All forms of art, fics, head-canons, AMV’s and edits are more than welcome for this week.

If you wish to create a post featuring a form of nsfw, we would appreciate it if you could put it under the read-more link–and make sure to tag it or make it aware that it is an nsfw post.

For some prompts such as double date, we recognise that a variety of pairs may be chosen for the second/background pair. Thus, we must emphasise that under no circumstances should ship hate be expressed.

No form of student x teacher, adult x minor etc shipping is allowed

Trigger warnings should be explained or stated before revealing said content

DO NOT SUBMIT ART OR FICS THAT DO NOT BELONG TO YOU!

Once again, we can’t wait for this ship week to commence, and to see all the lovely content for these two dorks! Here’s to another great week!! <3

i’m back with another kiribaku drawing! for some reason tumblr ruined the quality and doesn’t like the color red (:

i initially did the base and decided it fit kiri and baku, but the pose was mostly to work on my anatomy (which is still a work in progress). but uh, yeah i hope you guys enjoy!! 

and here is the picture its referenced from!!

blog.name: ao3feed-kiribaku
blog.title: Shitty Hair x Blasty Fanfics
blog.description:
☆Kirishima Eijirou/Bakugou Katsuki fanfics☆
☆Please check the FAQ before asking anything thank you☆
☆Created 3/18/2019, no fics from before this date can appear here☆

title: On Silent Ears
description:
by klanceuwu

a story in which bakugou finds out he’s going deaf and class 1-a is worried about him, not knowing what happened to him.

—

“Yes. We recently found out something that will affect Katsuki drastically,” Mitsuki said.

Whispers spread throughout the room as they took in what she said.

“And what would that be?”

Bakugou felt his face go red, seeing as everyone was looking at him with curiosity. “Don’t get too keen on seeing those faces, they’ll probably be the ones who decide to kick you out for being deaf,” he thought.

“Katsuki is going deaf and we can’t stop it.”

The silence that followed was deafening.

Words: 2094, Chapters: 4/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence
  • Categories: F/F, Gen, M/M
  • Characters: Bakugou Katsuki, Bakugou Mitsuki, Bakugou Masaru, Midoriya Izuku, Todoroki Shouto, Aizawa Shouta | Eraserhead, Kirishima Eijirou, Ashido Mina, Kaminari Denki, Sero Hanta, Utsushimi Camie, Class 1-A (My Hero Academia)
  • Relationships: Bakugou Katsuki/Kirishima Eijirou, Kaminari Denki/Sero Hanta, Ashido Mina/Hagakure Tooru, Jirou Kyouka/Yaoyorozu Momo, Midoriya Izuku/Todoroki Shouto, Asui Tsuyu/Uraraka Ochako, Bakugou Katsuki/Suffering, Bakugou Katsuki & Utsushimi Camie, Aizawa Shouta | Eraserhead/Yamada Hizashi | Present Mic
  • Additional Tags: Deaf Bakugou Katsuki, Bakugou Katsuki Swears A Lot, Bakugou Katsuki is Bad at Feelings, Protective Kirishima Eijirou, Midoriya Izuku is a Dork, Hurt Bakugou Katsuki, Parental Aizawa Shouta | Eraserhead

tags: let me know if this needs to be tagged as anything else
it's been a hot minute since i've posted anything even remotely bloody
i tried not to go the recovery route since i knew a lot of other people were probably going to
but the only other ideas i could think of were 'recovering a lost cat' (which... kinda wish i did)
and art of my own got dang fanfic
this turned out nice i suppose

summary:
Kirishima: Why are Bakugou and Midoriya sitting with their backs to each other?
Uraraka: Apparently they had a fight.
Kirishima:...
body:
Kirishima: Why are Bakugou and Midoriya sitting with their backs to each other?

Uraraka: Apparently they had a fight.

Kirishima: Then why they are holding hands?

Uraraka: That’s their way to apologise to each other.
